headline: PTC positioned as a Leader in the SPARK Matrix™: Industrial Edge Connectivity Platforms, Q4 2025 by QKS Group
summary: Pune, India, Nov. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The QKS Group SPARK Matrix™ provides competitive analysis & ranking of the leading Industrial Edge Connectivity Platform vendors. PTC, with its comprehensive industrial connectivity solutions, has received strong ratings across technology excellence and customer impact. QKS Group announced today that it has named PTC as a leader in the SPARK Matrix™: Industrial Edge Connectivity Platforms, Q4 2025. Vyshak K, Principal Analyst at QKS Group, states, "
